Html:
Hey radioman.

Is there a built-in method for determining the points of intersection between two routes?

If not, I can even make due if there is a way to determine a point of intersection between two markers with a bearing.

If not, I'll have to write it myself.  Just trying to save the effort if you have something included already.

Thanks again!

check http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html

there are many functions, but i include only few basic, like Distance and Bearing in map.MapProvider.Projection
Thanks.  That's the link I was beginning to use yesterday.
